summary: The diff modifies frontend/src/components/AllLocationsMap.tsx to remove the static map image element. The map container now uses a bg-muted background instead of rendering a static image. Two other files were also modified: frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json, which are metadata/state files. The core requirement (removing the static map image from AllLocationsMap.tsx) appears to be implemented. However, the constraint that no other file may be modified is potentially violated by changes to frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json.

hallucinated_features.description: Modification of frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json beyond the allowed AllLocationsMap.tsx file
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'Do not modify any other file, component, page, route, or backend file.' The diff shows two additional files were modified.
